summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Dharani TVS Business AI Manager. All backend APIs working correctly with proper GIDs for all 5 branches. Fixed frontend column name mismatches in Enquiries.js and Bookings.js. Sidebar navigation verified - Sales, Service, Inventory menus visible on all pages, Help & Support removed, branch selector hidden only on Main Dashboard.
passed_tests: API root endpoint returns active status
Auth /api/auth/me returns user data with valid session token
Auth /api/auth/me returns 401 without token
GET /api/sheets/branches returns all 5 branches (Bhavani, Kumarapalayam, Anthiyur, Kavindapadi, Ammapettai)
GET /api/sheets/stock-data returns data for Bhavani (GID=471760422) - 8 records
GET /api/sheets/stock-data returns data for Kumarapalayam (GID=2505719) - 10 records
GET /api/sheets/stock-data returns data for Anthiyur (GID=1670776756)
GET /api/sheets/stock-data returns data for Kavindapadi (GID=522931946)
GET /api/sheets/stock-data returns data for Ammapettai (GID=674010899)
GET /api/sheets/enquiry-data returns data for all branches - 45+ records per branch
GET /api/sheets/bookings-data returns data for all branches - 46+ records per branch
GET /api/sheets/sales-data returns data for all branches - 155+ records
Sidebar shows Sales menu (Dashboard, Enquiries, Bookings, Sold) on all pages
Sidebar shows Service menu on all pages
Sidebar shows Inventory menu on all pages
Help & Support button removed from sidebar
Branch selector hidden on Main Dashboard (/global)
Branch selector visible on other pages (Inventory, Enquiries, Bookings, etc.)
Inventory page displays stock data with correct columns (MODEL, Colour, Frame No, Engine No, Quantity, TVS Invoice Date, Aging Stock, etc.)
Enquiries page displays data with correct columns (Date, Customer Name, Phone, Model, Source, Status, Executive)
Bookings page displays data with correct columns (Booking Date, Customer Name, Phone No, Model, Executive, Booking Amount, Payment Mode)

success_rate.frontend: 100% (All pages load correctly, navigation works, data displays properly)

seed_data_creation: Using existing test user and session from main agent
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. Backend APIs return proper data for all 5 branches with correct GIDs. Frontend column names fixed in Enquiries.js and Bookings.js to match actual Google Sheets column names. Stock data columns: MODEL, Colour, Frame No, Engine No, Quantity, TVS Invoice Date, Aging Stock (Days), Dealer Invoice Status, PDI Status. Enquiry data columns: Date, Executive, Customer Name, Phone, Model, Source, Status. Bookings data columns: Booking Date, Customer Name, Executive, Phone No, Model, Booking Amount, Payment Mode.
